title: Haphazardly Implausible
description: Three unlikely heroes. A world teetering on the edgeof war. A mad man who will stop at nothing to gaincomplete power.Peter Jones, an Aeropilot in the Scottish Royal AirForce, has grown up believing his parents abandoned him.Isidore Thaddeus Reichmann, a famous detective runningfrom his past, is trying to save the last person he caresabout. Singur, an inventor who has been forced to hide hisreal name his whole life or risk being killed, holds animportant secret. These three have never met. They live indifferent countries and have little in common.Little do they know their lives are about to entwine andthat together they have the power to save the world fromcomplete destruction, or destroy everything.Loyalties are questioned. Friendships are betrayed.Trust is shaken. Who do you turn to when the friendsyou've always relied upon become your worst enemies?
author: Jack Lewis Baillot
